  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs a new Board object that has a 4x4 array of empty Spikes.

  • Method Details

    • isSpikeFullAt

      public boolean isSpikeFullAt(int row, int col)
      Checks if a spike is full at a specified location.
      Parameters:
      row - coordinate of spike to check.
      col - coordinate of spike to check.
      Returns:
      True if the spike is full, false otherwise.

    • removeTopBeadFrom

      public boolean removeTopBeadFrom(int row, int col)
      Remove the top bead from a Spike on a specified row and column.
      Parameters:
      row - Specified row coordinate
      col - Specified column coordinate
      Returns:
      True if a bead was removed, False if otherwise.

    • addBead

      public boolean addBead(int row, int col, BeadColour beadColor)
      Adds a bead to the specified spike if possible.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the spike.
      col - The column of the spike.
      beadColor - The color of the bead to add.
      Returns:
      True if the bead was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • clearBoard

      public void clearBoard()
      Clears the board by clearing all spikes.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if the board is full.
      Returns:
      True if the board is full, false otherwise.

    • showBoard

      public String showBoard()
      Returns an ASCII representation of the form of a list. Eg. A1, B1, C1, D1, A2....
      Returns:
      The String of the board in ASCII list format.

    • drawBoard

      public String drawBoard()
      Returns the board in an ascii format but in a more interactive design.
      Returns:
      The board drawn in ascii format.

    • appendOffset

      private void appendOffset(StringBuilder boardDrawing, int col)
      Helper method to draw offset for each row of spikes.
      Parameters:
      boardDrawing - The string of board drawing to which the offset is appended.
      col - The column number for which the offset is being calculated for.

    • drawLevel

      private void drawLevel(StringBuilder boardDrawing, int col, int level)
      Helper method to draw each level of the spike.
      Parameters:
      boardDrawing - The board drawing to which the level of the spike is appended.
      col - The column number for which the level is to be being drawn.
      level - The level number that is being to be drawn.

    • getBeadChar

      private char getBeadChar(int row, int col, int level)
      Helper method to get the corresponding character for each bead. We should have overidden toString() in a real bead class instead of relying on a beadColour enum ;(.
      Parameters:
      row - The row number of the bead.
      col - The column number of the bead.
      level - The level of the bead on a spike.
      Returns:
      The character representation of the bead 'B' 'W' or | or null.

    • getBeadColour

      private BeadColour getBeadColour(int x, int y, int z)
      Retrieves the color of the bead at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate (row) of the bead.
      y - The y-coordinate (column) of the bead.
      z - The z-coordinate (level) of the bead.
      Returns:
      The colour of the bead at the specified position, or null if no bead is present.

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin()
      Checks if there's a winning condition on the board. This method evaluates all possible line conditions including straight, layer diagonals, and skew diagonals.
      Returns:
      true if a win condition is found, false otherwise.

    • checkLine

      private boolean checkLine(BeadColour a, BeadColour b, BeadColour c, BeadColour d)
      Checks line of beads for a winning condition based on bead colors.
      Parameters:
      a - First bead color in the line.
      b - Second bead color in the line.
      c - Third bead color in the line.
      d - Fourth bead color in the line.
      Returns:
      true if all beads are of the same color and not null, false otherwise.

    • checkVerticalStraights

      private boolean checkVerticalStraights()
      Checks for any vertical winning lines across the board.
      Returns:
      true if a vertical win is found, false otherwise.

    • checkHorizontalStraights

      private boolean checkHorizontalStraights()
      Checks for any horizontal winning lines across the board.
      Returns:
      true if a horizontal win is found, false otherwise.

    • checkLayerStraights

      private boolean checkLayerStraights()
      Checks for any front-to-back winning lines across the board.
      Returns:
      true if a front-to-back win is found, false otherwise.

    • checkDiagonalsAndSkewDiagonals

      private boolean checkDiagonalsAndSkewDiagonals()
      Checks for any 2d/3d diagonal winning lines.
      Returns:
      true if a diagonal win is found, false otherwise.

    • checkRowDiagonals

      private boolean checkRowDiagonals()
      Checks diagonal lines within a row of spikes
      Returns:
      True if a line is foumd, false otherwise.
